name: Voidclaw Zombie
movement: 40 feet walking and 20 feet climbing, highly mobile
description: A small, chaotic evil undead creature, known for its erratic movements and strong necrotic attacks, the Voidclaw Zombie exhibits a distinct ability to avoid damage and inflict ongoing painful wounds.
memorable: Its ability to remain standing despite lethal damage makes it difficult to defeat, along with its unique necrotic wound effects.
goals: Typically hunts living creatures, seeking to drain their life force.
relations: Often encountered with other undead or dark creatures, making it a part of a larger necromantic menace.
environment: Commonly found in dark, decayed, or cursed areas.
strengths: Fast movement and the ability to inflict ongoing necrotic damage; resilient against attacks.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores lead to limited mental capacity.
attacks: Multiattack feature allows for quick strikes with either Void Claws or Void Bolts, delivering slashing and necrotic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Undead Fortitude allows it to potentially survive lethal damage by making saving throws.
skills: Has perception with a poor modifier of -2.
additional_information: Immunity to necrotic and poison damage types
Disadvantage on opportunity attacks due to Erratic Movement
Advantage on saves against turning effects
Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep
Ongoing necrotic damage from its Void Claw attack can be purged
test_queries: undead that drains life with chaotic attacks
small necrotic inflicting zombie with unique abilities
zombie immune to turning and dealing ongoing damage
mobile undead with resilient survival ability
Voidclaw Zombie chaos in dark environments
